pages.text: I really hate skeleton's arrows, whenever I go to a cave, some of them will eventually stick in myself. And this is why I adore turtle's shells.$(br) For a really long time I couldn't connect dots in my mind, but after reading old scripture I found a way to use them for myself. I get some scutes from dead turtles and get to work. After some time I create cape from them.
Fifty fifty defense against arrows and wearing it makes a little bit of a pain, but I think there's a way to refine it.

Unfortunately after many test it fills unfinished, but in the same time I can't find a way to refine it. Scutes of this cape look so faded like they lacked energy. $(br)$(o)$(7)Maby I could use Copper Altar to infuse it with power of lightning.$()

I was right. Using Copper Altar made it posible to infuse cape with power of lightning. Still it is a little bit of a pain to wear, but it's better then before and now it does not pass any arrows like before.
